code: "use strict"; Object.defineProperty(exports, "__esModule", { value: true }); var operators_1 = require("rxjs/operators"); /** * * Re-emits all notifications from source Observable with specified scheduler. * * Ensure a specific scheduler is used, from outside of an Observable. * * `observeOn` is an operator that accepts a scheduler as a first parameter, which will be used to reschedule * notifications emitted by the source Observable.
